</script><script type="text/template" id="percentOff-md-SUPPLE">
<~
    if(data.deal.pricingData.prices.dealPrice) {
        var basisPrice;
        var textColor  = 'base';

        if(gb.utils.isDOTDDeal(data.deal) && (data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.SOLDOUT || 
                data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.EXPIRED)) {
            textColor = 'secondary';
        }

        if(data.deal.detail.itemType === gb.enums.ItemTypes.SINGLE || data.deal.detail.itemType === gb.enums.ItemTypes.VARIATION) {

            var percentOff = data.deal.pricingData.percentOff;
            var bKind      = data.deal.pricingData.bKind;
            var priceLabel = null;
            if (percentOff && data.deal.pricingData.prices.basisPrice) {
                basisPrice = data.deal.pricingData.prices.basisPrice.min.formattedValue;
            }

            if (data.asin) {
                percentOff = data.asin.percentOff;
                basisPrice = data.asin.basisPriceFormatted;
                bKind      = data.asin.bKind;
                if (!data.showPercentOff && data.asin.percentOff) {
                    percentOff = Math.round(gb.utils.getDisplayablePercentOff(data.asin.percentOff)*10)/10;
                }
            }

            if (bKind === gb.enums.priceKind.LIST_PRICE) {
                priceLabel = gb.resources.getString('gb-list');
            } else {
                priceLabel = gb.resources.getString('gb-price');
            }

            if (percentOff) {
                var percentOffString = gb.resources.getString('csld-percent_off', {discountPercentage: percentOff});

                if (textColor === 'secondary') {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-small unitLineHeight">
                       <span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary inlineBlock unitLineHeight">
                            {{priceLabel}}
                        </span>
                        <span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary inlineBlock unitLineHeight a-text-strike">{{basisPrice}}</span>
                        <span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary inlineBlock unitLineHeight">
                            {{percentOffString}}
                        </span>
                    </div>
<~
                } else if (textColor === 'base') {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-small unitLineHeight">
                       <span class="a-size-base a-color-base inlineBlock unitLineHeight">
                            {{priceLabel}}
                        </span>
                        <span class="a-size-base a-color-base inlineBlock unitLineHeight a-text-strike">{{basisPrice}}</span>

                        <span class="a-size-base a-color-base inlineBlock unitLineHeight">
                            {{percentOffString}}
                        </span>
                    </div>
<~
                }
            }
        }
    }

</script><script type="text/template" id="dealType-md-SUPPLE">

<~
    var dealTypeText = "";
    var dotdSoldout = false;

    if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.DOTD && data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.SOLDOUT) {
        dotdSoldout = true;
    }
    if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.DOTD) {
        dealTypeText = gb.resources.getString('gb-deal-of-the-day');
    } else if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LD) {
        if(data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.UPCOMING) {
            dealTypeText = gb.resources.getString('gb-upcoming-lightning-deal');
            if (data.deal.detail.primeAccessType === gb.enums.DealAccessTypes.PRIME_EARLY_ACCESS ) {
                dealTypeText = gb.resources.getString('gb_upcoming_prime_early_access_deal');
            } else if(data.deal.detail.isPrimeOnly) {
                dealTypeText = gb.resources.getString('gb_upcoming_prime_exclusive_deal');
            }

        } else {
            dealTypeText = gb.resources.getString('gb-lightning-deal');
            if (data.deal.detail.primeAccessType === gb.enums.DealAccessTypes.PRIME_EARLY_ACCESS ) {
                dealTypeText = gb.resources.getString('gb_lightning_prime_early_access_deal');
            } else if(data.deal.detail.isPrimeOnly) {
                dealTypeText = (data.deal.detail.primeAccessType === gb.enums.DealAccessTypes.PRIME_ONLY_LD ) ? gb.resources.getString('gb_m_prime_exclusive_deal') :
                                    gb.resources.getString('gb_prime_only_dotdl_caps');
            }
        }
    }

    if(dealTypeText) {

        if(dotdSoldout) {
~>
            <span class="a-size-mini a-color-secondary inlineBlock unitLineHeight">
                {{dealTypeText}}
            </span>
<~
        } else {
~>
            <span class="a-size-mini inlineBlock unitLineHeight">
                {{dealTypeText}}
            </span>
<~
        }
    }
~>

                if (templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.PENDINGATC || templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.ADD_TO_CART || templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.JOIN_WAITLIST) {
                    if(templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.ADD_TO_CART || templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.PENDINGATC) {
                        buttonAction = gb.enums.ButtonActions.ATC;
                    } else {
                        buttonAction = gb.enums.ButtonActions.JW;
                    }

                    if(isVariation) {
                        asin = data.asin ? data.asin.asinID : null;

                        if(data.unavailableAsinSelected) {
                            buttonStatus = "disabled";
                            buttonAction = null;
                        }
                    }
~>
                    <span class="a-declarative" data-action="{{buttonAction}}" data-{{buttonAction}}="{&quot;dealState&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.dealState}}&quot;,&quot;legacyDealID&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.legacyDealID}}&quot;,&quot;dealType&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.dealType}}&quot;,&quot;position&quot;:&quot;{{data.position}}&quot;,&quot;asin&quot;:&quot;{{asin}}&quot;,&quot;widgetID&quot;:&quot;{{data.widgetID}}&quot;,&quot;offerID&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.offerID}}&quot;,&quot;dealID&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.dealID}}&quot;}">

                        </button></span></span>
                    </span>
<~

                        </span>
<~

<~
                } else {
~>
                    {{data.elements.image}}
<~

<~

<~
                }

            </div>
<~
        }

    </div>

</script><script type="text/template" id="available-SUPPLE">
<~
    if (gb.controller.schedulingParams[data.widgetID].showShortCellView) {
~>
        <div class="a-section dealContainer">

    <div class="a-section backGround layer">
    </div>

    <div class="a-section layer">
<~
        var itemType = data.deal.detail.itemType;
        var isPOAccessType = data.deal.detail.primeAccessType === gb.enums.DealAccessTypes.PRIME_ONLY_DOTD;
        if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LD || isPOAccessType) {
            var stateTemplate = null;
            switch (data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState) {
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INCART        : stateTemplate = data.elements.incart; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INWAITLIST    : stateTemplate = data.elements.inwaitlist; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.PENDINGATC    : stateTemplate = data.elements.pendingatc; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.WAITLIST_FULL : stateTemplate = data.elements.waitlistfull; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.CLAIMED       : stateTemplate = data.elements.claimed;
            }
        }
        if(gb.utils.isDOTDDeal(data.deal)) {
            if(data.isDoubleCell) {
~>
                <div class="a-section">
                    {{data.elements.image}}
                    <div class="a-row dealTileLowerDouble">
<~                      if(data.isPrimeOnly) {  ~>
                            <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.primeBadge}}</div>
<~                      } else {   ~>
                            <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.dealType}}</div>
<~                      }   ~>
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.title}}</div>
<~
                        if(stateTemplate) {
~>
                            {{stateTemplate}}
<~
                        } else {
~>
                            <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                            <div class="a-row bottomMinusTen">{{data.elements.time}}</div>
<~                      }   ~>
                    </div>
                </div>
<~
            } else {
~>
                <div class="a-row dealTile">
                    {{data.elements.image}}
<~                      if(data.isPrimeOnly) {  ~>
                            <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.primeBadge}}</div>
<~                      } else {   ~>
                            <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.dealType}}</div>
<~                      }   ~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.title}}</div>
<~
                    if(stateTemplate) {
~>
                        {{stateTemplate}}
<~
                    } else {
~>
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                        <div class="a-row buttonOuterContainer">{{data.elements.time}}</div>
<~                  }   ~>
                </div>
<~
            }
        } else if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LD) {
~>
            <div class="a-row dealTile">
<~
                if(gb.utils.isDealInEarlyAccessWindow(data.deal)) {
~>

                        {{data.elements.image}}
                        <div class="a-row titleContainer">
                            {{data.elements.title}}
                        </div>
                    </div>
<~
                } else {
~>
                    {{data.elements.image}}
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.title}}</div>
<~
                }
                if (stateTemplate) {
~>
                    {{stateTemplate}}
<~
                } else {
                    if(gb.utils.isDealInEarlyAccessWindow(data.deal) || data.isPrimeOnly) {
~>
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.primeBadge}}</div>
<~
                    }
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini unitLineHeight">{{data.elements.percentClaimedBar}}</div>
                    
<~
                    if (!data.showCouponCount) {
~>
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini unitLineHeight">
                            <div class="a-column a-span5 a-text-left unitLineHeight">
<~
                                if (data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.JOIN_WAITLIST) {
~>
                                    {{data.elements.waitlistavailable}}
<~
                                } else {
~>
                                    {{data.elements.percentClaimed}}
<~
                                }
~>
                            </div>
                            <div class="a-column a-span7 a-text-right unitLineHeight a-span-last">                     
                                {{data.elements.time}}
                            </div>
                        </div>
<~
                    } else {
~>                                           
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini unitLineHeight">
                            <div class="a-column a-span8 a-text-left unitLineHeight">
<~
                                if (data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.JOIN_WAITLIST) {
~>
                                    {{data.elements.waitlistavailable}}
<~
                                } else {
~>
                                    {{data.elements.percentClaimed}}
<~
                                }
~>
                            </div>
                            <div class="a-column a-span4 a-text-right unitLineHeight a-span-last"> 
                                {{data.elements.couponCount}}
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini unitLineHeight">
                            {{data.elements.time}}
                        </div>
<~
                    }
                }
~>
            </div>
<~
        } else if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.BD ) {
~>
            <div class="a-row dealTile">
                {{data.elements.image}}
<~
                if(data.deal.auxiliaryData.breaksMAP) {
~>
                    <div class="a-section a-spacing-mini restVisible hiddenCss">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                    <div class="a-section a-spacing-mini hoverVisible">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
<~
                }
                if(itemType === gb.enums.ItemTypes.SINGLE) {
                    if (data.deal.auxiliaryData.breaksMAP) {
~>
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini hiddenCss">emptyBlock</div>
<~
                    }
~>
                    {{data.elements.title}}
<~
                    if(!data.deal.auxiliaryData.breaksMAP) {
~>
                      <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
<~
                    }
                } else {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini hiddenCss">emptyBlock</div>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini">{{data.elements.title}}</div>
<~
                }
~>
            </div>
<~
        } else if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.COUPON) {
~>
            <div class="a-row dealTile">
                {{data.elements.image}}
                {{data.elements.title}}
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
            </div>
<~
        } else if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LOCAL) {
~>
            <div class="a-row dealContainer dealTile">
                {{data.elements.image}}
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini restVisible hiddenCss">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini hoverVisible">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                {{data.elements.title}}
            </div>
<~
        }
~>
    </div>
</div>
<~
    } else {
~>
        <div class="a-section dealContainer">

    <div class="a-section backGround layer">
    </div>

    <div class="a-section layer">
<~
        var buttonOuterContainer = "";
        var itemType = data.deal.detail.itemType;
        var isPOAccessType = data.deal.detail.primeAccessType === gb.enums.DealAccessTypes.PRIME_ONLY_DOTD;
        var isPODealForNonPrimeUser = gb.utils.isPODealForNonPrimeUser(data.deal);

        if(gb.utils.isDOTDDeal(data.deal)) {
            var dealTitle = "dealTile";

            if(data.isDoubleCell) {
                dealTitle = "dealTileLowerDouble";
                buttonOuterContainer = "fixedWidth210";
            }
~>
            <div class="a-row dealContainer {{dealTitle}}">
                {{data.elements.image}}
<~
                if(data.isPrimeOnly) {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.primeBadge}}</div>
<~
                } else {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.dealType}}</div>
<~
                }
~>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.time}}</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.title}}</div>
<~
                if(isPODealForNonPrimeUser) {
~>

                        {{data.elements.primeOnlyAccess}}
                    </div>
<~
                } else {
                    if (itemType === gb.enums.ItemTypes.SINGLE) {
~>

<~
                    }
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.reviewStars}}</div>
<~
                    if (data.deal.checkingDealStatus) {
~>
                        <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini bottomMinusFive {{buttonOuterContainer}}">
                            {{data.elements.checkingDealStatus}}
                        </div>
<~
                    } else {
                        if(!isPOAccessType) {
~>
                            <div class="a-row buttonOuterContainer {{buttonOuterContainer}}">
<~

~>
                                <div class="a-row a-spacing-medium">{{data.elements.cartMessage}}</div>
<~
                            } else if (data.deal.postActionMessage) {
~>
                                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.cartMessage}}</div>
<~
                            }

                            if (!data.deal.isOfferingRestrictionViolated) {
~>
                                {{data.elements.button}}
<~
                            }
~>
                            </div>
            </div>
<~
                        }
                    }
                }

~>

                {{data.elements.image}}

~>

<~
                } else {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini hiddenCss">emptyBlock</div>
<~
                }
~>

                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini unitLineHeight">
                    {{data.elements.percentClaimedBar}}
                </div>

<~
                if (!data.showCouponCount) {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini unitLineHeight">
                        <div class="a-column a-span5 a-text-left unitLineHeight">
                            {{data.elements.percentClaimed}}
                        </div>
                        <div class="a-column a-span7 a-text-right unitLineHeight a-span-last">
                            {{data.elements.time}}
                        </div>
                    </div>

<~
                } else {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini unitLineHeight">
                        <div class="a-column a-span8 a-text-left unitLineHeight">
                            {{data.elements.percentClaimed}}
                        </div>
                        <div class="a-column a-span4 a-text-right unitLineHeight a-span-last">
                            {{data.elements.couponCount}}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini a-spacing-top-mini unitLineHeight">
                        {{data.elements.time}}
                    </div>
<~

~>

                if(isPODealForNonPrimeUser && data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState !== gb.enums.PurchaseStates.WAITLIST_FULL) {
~>
                    <div id="primeOnlySection" class="a-section">
                        {{data.elements.primeOnlyAccess}}
                    </div>

                } else {
                    if (data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.PENDINGATC) {
~>
                        {{data.elements.pendingatc}}
<~
                    } else {
                        if(gb.utils.isDealInEarlyAccessWindow(data.deal) && !gb.resources.customerData.hasEarlyAccessBenefit){
~>
                            {{data.elements.time}}
                            {{data.elements.primeEarlyAccess}}

                        } else {

~>
            <div class="a-row dealContainer dealTile">
                {{data.elements.image}}
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini hiddenCss">emptyBlock</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.priceBlock}}</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.title}}</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.shipSold}}</div>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">{{data.elements.reviewStars}}</div>
                <div class="a-row buttonOuterContainer">{{data.elements.button}}</div>
            </div>

        } else if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LOCAL) {

                <div class="a-row buttonOuterContainer">{{data.elements.button}}</div>
            </div>
<~
        }

        if((data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LD || isPOAccessType) &&
            !data.deal.checkingDealStatus) {
            var stateTemplate = null;
            switch (data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState) {
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INCART        : stateTemplate = data.elements.incart; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INWAITLIST    : stateTemplate = data.elements.inwaitlist; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.WAITLIST_FULL : stateTemplate = data.elements.waitlistfull; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.CLAIMED       : stateTemplate = data.elements.claimed;
            }
            if (stateTemplate) {
                if(data.templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INCART) {
~>
                    {{stateTemplate}}
<~
                } else {
~>
                    <div class="a-row a-spacing-medium bottomMinusFive">
                        {{stateTemplate}}
                    </div>
<~
                }
            } else {
~>
                <div class="a-row buttonOuterContainer {{buttonOuterContainer}}">{{data.elements.button}}</div>
<~
            }
~>
        </div>
<~
        }
~>
    </div>
</div>
<~
    }
~>

            ~>

        }

                    {{data.elements.shipSold}}
                </div>

        ~>
                {{data.elements.selector}}
        <~
            }

                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INCART        : stateTemplate = data.elements.incart; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.INWAITLIST    : stateTemplate = data.elements.inwaitlist; break;
                case gb.enums.PurchaseStates.WAITLIST_FULL : stateTemplate = data.elements.waitlistfull; break;

                    {{stateTemplate}}
                </div>

        <~
            }

        ~>

                    <div class="a-column a-span6">
                        {{data.elements.checkingDealStatus}}
                    </div>
                </div>
        <~
            } else {
        ~>
                <div class="a-row a-spacing-top-medium">
        <~

        ~>
                    <div class="a-column a-span12">
        <~
                } else {
        ~>
                    <div class="a-column a-span6">
        <~
                }
                        if(data.deal.postActionMessage) {
        ~>
                            {{data.elements.cartMessage}}
        <~
                        }
                        if (!data.deal.isOfferingRestrictionViolated) {
        ~>
                            {{data.elements.button}}
        <~
                        }
        ~>
                    </div>
                </div>
        <~
            }
        }
        ~>
    </div>
</div>
</script><script type='text/template' id='summary-GRID-HERO'>
<~
    // Generates the summary (plain text) of all the selected filters in a filters.
    function generateFilterSummary (filters, attribute, data) {
        if (filters.length > 2) {
            var str = gb.filterController.models[data.eventID].filterPlurals[attribute] || attribute;
            return filters.length + " " + str;
        } else {
            var separator = " " + gb.resources.getString("gb_summary_filter_separator") + " ";
            return _.map(filters, function(filterOption) {
                return data.view.getFilterLabel(filterOption, true);
            }).join(separator);
        }
    }

    // PageData for rendering page number details.
    var pageData = _.find(data.filterOptions, function(filterOption) {
        return filterOption.attribute === "page";
    });

    pageData.dealCount = gb.metadata.getAllDisplayableDealIDs(data.widgetID).length;
    pageData.pageSize  = gb.controller.schedulingParams[data.widgetID].pageSize;

    var selectedFilterTypes = _.filter(data.filterOptions, function(filterOption) {
        return filterOption.selected;
    });

    var filtersByAttr = _.groupBy(selectedFilterTypes, function(filterOption){
        return filterOption.attribute;
    });

    var summary = _.map(filtersByAttr, function(filters, attribute) {
        return {
            attr : attribute,
            text : generateFilterSummary(filters, attribute, data)
        };
    });

    if (pageData.dealCount || summary.length) {
~>
        <span>
<~
            var str;
            var total    = pageData.dealCount;
            var pageSize = pageData.pageSize;
            var start    = (pageData.currentPage - 1) * pageSize + 1;
            var end      = start + pageSize - 1;
                end      = end > total ? total : end;

            if (start > end) { /* Means the pagination has gone too far */
                str = summary.length ? 'gb_no_results_to_show_for' : 'gb_no_results_to_show';
                print(gb.resources.getString(str));
            } else {
                str = summary.length ? 'gb_showing_x_results_for' : 'gb_showing_x_results';
                print(gb.resources.getString(str, {
                    start : start,
                    end   : end,
                    total : total
                }));
            }
~>
        </span>
<~
    }
    if (summary.length) {

        // Sort the items by attribute priority
        summary = _.sortBy(summary, function(item) {
            return _.indexOf(data.attrPriority, item.attr);
        });
        _.each(summary, function(summaryItem, index) {

            // Find the next attributes - ie attributes with lower priority than current.
            // Why? When clicking on any of the links on the breadcrumb, the filtering
            // on the attributes listed after it in the list should be removed.
            var attributes = _.pluck(_.rest(summary, index + 1), 'attr').join(',');
            if (index < summary.length - 1) {
~>
                <span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbfilter-link" data-gbfilter-link="{&quot;linkType&quot;:&quot;clear&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:&quot;{{attributes}}&quot;}">
                    <a class="a-link-normal summary" href="#">
<~
            }
~>
                        <span class="a-text-bold">
                            {{summaryItem.text}}
                        </span>
<~
            if (index < summary.length - 1) {
~>
                    </a>
                </span>
<~
            }
~>
            <span class="a-text-bold">
<~
                print(index === summary.length - 1 ? '' : ' : ');
~>
            </span>
<~
        });
~>
        <span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbfilter-clear-all" data-gbfilter-clear-all="{}">
            <a class="a-link-normal a-text-bold" href="#">
                &nbsp;
                <i data-value="{{filtersByAttr}}" class="a-icon a-icon-close a-icon-medium clearFilter"></i>
            </a>
        </span>
<~
    }
~>
</script>
<script type='text/template' id='pagination-GRID-HERO'>
<~
    var widgetID   = data.widgetID;
    var widgetName = data.widgetName;

    data = data.filterOptions[0];

    // Display pagination bar only if more than one page of data is present.
    if (data.totalPages < 2) {
        return;
    }

    var nextString = gb.resources.getString('gb_next_page');
    var prevString = gb.resources.getString('gb_previous_page');
    var random = Math.random().toString().split('.')[1];
~>

<span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbfilter-pagination" data-gbfilter-pagination="{&quot;attribute&quot;:&quot;{{data.attribute}}&quot;,&quot;currentPage&quot;:&quot;{{data.currentPage}}&quot;,&quot;totalPages&quot;:&quot;{{data.totalPages}}&quot;,&quot;widgetID&quot;:&quot;{{widgetID}}&quot;,&quot;filterType&quot;:&quot;pagination&quot;}">

    <div id="pagination-both-{{random}}" class="a-text-center hidden"><ul class="a-pagination"><li><a href="#{{data.dummyUrls.PREV}}">&larr;<span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-letter-space"></span>{{prevString}}</a></li> <li class="a-last"><a href="#{{data.dummyUrls.NEXT}}">{{nextString}}<span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-letter-space"></span>&rarr;</a></li></ul></div>

    <div id="pagination-next-{{random}}" class="a-text-center hidden"><ul class="a-pagination"><li class="a-disabled">&larr;<span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-letter-space"></span>{{prevString}}</li> <li class="a-last"><a href="#{{data.dummyUrls.NEXT}}">{{nextString}}<span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-letter-space"></span>&rarr;</a></li></ul></div>

    <div id="pagination-prev-{{random}}" class="a-text-center hidden"><ul class="a-pagination"><li><a href="#{{data.dummyUrls.PREV}}">&larr;<span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-letter-space"></span>{{prevString}}</a></li> <li class="a-disabled a-last">{{nextString}}<span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-letter-space"></span>&rarr;</li></ul></div>

    <div id='pagination-pages-{{random}}'>
<~

        // If only Previous and Next buttons are needed, then do not display the page buttons.
        if(!data.minimalPagination) {

            // We will re-use this var for ellipsis on either sides
            var alreadyPrintedEllipsis = false;
            var pagesToShowOnBothSides = (widgetName === gb.enums.WidgetNames.TAB_HERO || gb.enums.WidgetNames.PC_SUPPLE) ? 1 : 2;

            _.times(data.totalPages, function(i) {
                var index = i + 1;

                if (Math.abs(data.currentPage - index) <= pagesToShowOnBothSides || index === 1 || index === data.totalPages ||
                    (widgetName === gb.enums.WidgetNames.PC_SUPPLE && index === 3 && data.currentPage === 1)) {
                    // Flip so that ellipsis in the other end will be printed if required.
                    alreadyPrintedEllipsis = false;
                    if (index === data.currentPage) {
~>
                        <li class="a-selected"><a href="#">{{index}}</a></li>
<~
                    } else {
                        // Disabling last page number for PC supple widget if it is not among
                        // first 3 pages and the current page is not within last 3 pages.
                        if (widgetName === gb.enums.WidgetNames.PC_SUPPLE &&
                            index === data.totalPages && index > 3 &&
                            data.currentPage < data.totalPages-2) {
~>
                            <li class="a-disabled">{{index}}</li> <~
                        } else { ~>
                            <li data-page="{{index}}" class="a-normal"><a href="#">{{index}}</a></li>
<~
                        }
                    }
                } else if (!alreadyPrintedEllipsis) {
~>
                    <li class="a-disabled">...</li>
<~
                    alreadyPrintedEllipsis = true;
                }
            });
        }

        // Append the page buttons to the proper parent pagination container and
        // hide the other parents.
        _.defer(function($) {

            var parentId;
            if (data.currentPage === 1) {
               parentId = '#pagination-next-' + random;  // show only next button
            } else if(data.currentPage === data.totalPages) {
                parentId = '#pagination-prev-' + random;  // show only prev button
            } else {
                parentId = '#pagination-both-' + random;  // show both buttons
            }

            var prevButton = $('li', parentId).eq(0);
            $('li', '#pagination-pages-' + random).insertAfter(prevButton);
            $(parentId).removeClass('hidden');

        }, gb.Backbone.$);
~>

    </div>

</span>
</script>
<script type="text/template" id="dropdown-GRID-HERO">
<~
    var sortBy = gb.resources.getString('gb_sort_by');
    var randomId = 'dropdown-' + Math.random().toString().split('.')[1];
    var selectedOption = data.filterOptions[0].selected;
    var sortOptions = gb.controller.schedulingParams[data.widgetID].sortOptionsOverride;

    // Set the selected value using the dropdown API.
    _.defer(function() {
        P.when("a-dropdown").execute(function (dropdown) {
            var myDropdown = dropdown.getSelect(randomId);
            // TODO: See why myDropdown is null sometimes (when faceout widget is also scheduled on page)
            if (selectedOption && myDropdown) {
                myDropdown.setValue(selectedOption);
            }
        });
    });

    var sortOrderList = data.view.widgetView.isEventsWidget() ? gb.enums.SortOrderLists.Events : gb.enums.SortOrderLists.Deals;
    if(sortOptions.length){
       sortOrderList = sortOptions;
    }
~>
<span class="a-size-base">{{sortBy}}&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>
<span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbfilter-dropdown" data-gbfilter-dropdown="{&quot;attribute&quot;:&quot;sortOrder&quot;}">
    <span class="a-dropdown-container"><select name="sortOptions" autocomplete="off" id="{{randomId}}" tabIndex="-1" class="a-native-dropdown">
<~
        _.each(sortOrderList, function(sortOrder) {
            var sortOrderName   = gb.enums.SortOrders[sortOrder];
            var sortOrderString = gb.enums.SortOrdersToStringsMap[sortOrder];

            if(sortOrderName === selectedOption) {
~>
                <option value="{{sortOrderName}}" selected>
                        <~ print(gb.resources.getString(sortOrderString)); ~>
                </option>
            <~ } else { ~>
                <option value="{{sortOrderName}}">
                        <~ print(gb.resources.getString(sortOrderString)); ~>
                </option>
<~
            }
        });
~>
    </select><span tabIndex="-1" data-a-class="sortOrderDropdown" class="a-button a-button-dropdown a-button-small sortOrderDropdown"><span class="a-button-inner"><span class="a-button-text a-declarative" data-action="a-dropdown-button" role="button" tabIndex="0" aria-hidden="true"><span class="a-dropdown-prompt"></span></span><i class="a-icon a-icon-dropdown"></i></span></span></span>

<script type="text/template" id="checkboxes-FILTER-HERO">
<~
    var filterOptionList = data.filterOptions;

    // Find the number of selected items. Also find max selected
    // index to decide on whether to show expander or not.
    var selectedCount = 0;
    var currentIndex  = 0;
    var maxSelectedIndex = 0;
    _.each(filterOptionList, function(item) {
        if (item.selected) {
            selectedCount++, maxSelectedIndex = currentIndex;
        }
        currentIndex++;
    });

    if(selectedCount) {
        var clearText = gb.resources.getString('gb_filter_clear');
~>

        <span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbfilter-link" data-gbfilter-link="{&quot;linkType&quot;:&quot;clear&quot;,&quot;attributes&quot;:&quot;{{data.attributes}}&quot;}">

        </span>
<~

    // values count is greater than the defined displayable limit.

        filterOptionsLength > gb.enums.Constants.MAX_DISPLAYABLE_VALUES_IN_UNEXPANDED_FILTER &&

        textColor = 'secondary';

        textSize  = 'base';

            if (defaultMerchantName && merchant === defaultMerchantName) {
                print(gb.resources.getString('gb-ships-from-and-sold-by-amazon'));
            } else if (data.deal.detail.isFulfilledByAmazon && data.deal.detail.isFulfilledByAmazon !== "0") {
                print(gb.resources.getString('gb_soldby_x_and_fulfilled_by_amazon', {merchant: merchant}));

                print(gb.resources.getString('gb_ships_from_and_sold_by_x', {merchant: merchant}));
            }
~>

<~
    }

<script type="text/template" id="image-SUPPLE">
    <~
    var imageURL = gb.resources.getImage('goldbox_upcoming');
    var url      = data.deal.detail.URL;
    var itemType = data.deal.detail.itemType;
    var showShortCellView = gb.controller.schedulingParams[data.widgetID].showShortCellView;
    var encodedImage = gb.resources.images[data.deal.dealID];
    if(data.deal.detail.imageAsin) {
        imageURL = data.deal.detail.imageAsin;
    }

    if(data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.UPCOMING ||
       data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.COMINGSOON) {
        if(data.deal.teaser.teaserImage) {
            imageURL = data.deal.teaser.teaserImage;
        }
        url = data.deal.teaser.teaserURL || "";
    }

    if (url) {
        url = data.getReffedURL(url, gb.metrics.refTags.image);
    }

    var standardImage;
    var highResImage = gb.utils.resizeImage(imageURL, data.imageSize * gb.enums.Constants.HI_RES_SCALING_FACTOR);
    if (encodedImage) {
        standardImage = encodedImage;
    } else {
        standardImage = gb.utils.resizeImage(imageURL, data.imageSize);
    }

    if (showShortCellView) {
    ~>

    <span class="a-declarative" data-action="gb-image" data-gb-image="{&quot;position&quot;:&quot;{{data.position}}&quot;,&quot;widgetID&quot;:&quot;{{data.widgetID}}&quot;,&quot;itemType&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.detail.itemType}}&quot;,&quot;dealID&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.dealID}}&quot;,&quot;redirectionUrl&quot;:&quot;{{url}}&quot;}">

    <~
    }
    ~>
        <a id="{{gb.enums.dealViewIDs.IMAGE}}" class="a-link-normal" href="{{url}}">
            <div class="a-row a-spacing-base a-spacing-top-base imageBlock">
                <div class="a-row dealContainer">
                    <div class="a-row layer">
                        <img alt="" src="{{standardImage}}" data-a-hires="{{highResImage}}">
                    </div>
                    <div class="a-row layer backGround">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </a>
    <~
    if (showShortCellView) {
    ~>
    </span>
    <~
    }
    ~>
</script>

~>

                                {{data.templateDecisionInfo.buttonText}}
                            </a></span></span>
                        </span>
<~
                    }
                } else if (templateDecisionInfo.purchaseState === gb.enums.PurchaseStates.LEARN_MORE) {
                    var customerReffedURL = data.getReffedURL(data.deal.detail.URL, data.customerRefTag);
~>
                    <span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbdeal-actionrecord" data-gbdeal-actionrecord="{&quot;actionType&quot;:&quot;LEARN_MORE&quot;,&quot;position&quot;:&quot;{{data.position}}&quot;,&quot;widgetID&quot;:&quot;{{data.widgetID}}&quot;,&quot;dealID&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.dealID}}&quot;}">

</script><script type="text/template" id="title-SUPPLE">
<~
    var title             = data.deal.detail.title;
    var url               = data.getReffedURL(data.deal.detail.URL, gb.metrics.refTags.title);
    var showShortCellView = gb.controller.schedulingParams[data.widgetID].showShortCellView;
    var cssClass          = 'dealTitleOneLine unitLineHeight ';
    var itemType          = data.deal.detail.itemType;
    var titleColorBase    = 'base';
    var titleColorLink    = 'link';
    var cssClassBase      = 'restVisible ';
    var cssClassLink      = 'hoverVisible ';
    var baseVisiblity     = '';
    var widthCSS          = '';
    var isDOTDDeal        = gb.utils.isDOTDDeal(data.deal);
    if(!showShortCellView){
        cssClassBase      = 'hoverVisible ';
        cssClassLink      = 'restVisible ';
    }

    if(data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.BD && itemType != gb.enums.ItemTypes.SINGLE) {
        cssClass = 'dealTitleThreeLine ';
    } else if( (!showShortCellView && !isDOTDDeal) ||
        (data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LOCAL) ||
        (isDOTDDeal  && !data.isDoubleCell && !showShortCellView)) {
        cssClass = 'dealTitleTwoLine ';
    }

    if( (isDOTDDeal && (itemType != gb.enums.ItemTypes.SINGLE || data.isDoubleCell)) ||
        (data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.LOCAL) ||
        (data.deal.dealType === gb.enums.DealTypes.BD && itemType != gb.enums.ItemTypes.SINGLE) ) {
        baseVisiblity   = 'visibleCss ';
    }
    else {
        baseVisiblity   = 'hiddenCss ';
    }

    if(data.deal.auxiliaryData.breaksMAP) {
        baseVisiblity   = 'visibleCss ';
        cssClass = 'dealTitleTwoLine ';
    }

    if(data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.SOLDOUT || data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.EXPIRED || data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.WAITLISTFULL) {
        titleColorBase = 'secondary ';
        titleColorLink = 'secondary ';
    }
    if(isDOTDDeal && data.isDoubleCell){
        widthCSS = 'doubleCellTitle';
    } else {
        widthCSS = 'singleCellTitle';
    }

    var cssStringBase = cssClass + cssClassBase + baseVisiblity + widthCSS;
    var cssStringLink = cssClass + cssClassLink + widthCSS;

    if(data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.UPCOMING || data.deal.dealState === gb.enums.DealStates.COMINGSOON) {
        if(data.deal.teaser.teaserLine) {
            title = data.deal.teaser.teaserLine;
        }
        if(data.deal.teaser.teaserURL) {
            url = data.deal.teaser.teaserURL;
        } else {
            url = "";
        }
    }
    if(title === null || title === undefined) {
        title = '';
    }
    if(url) {
        url = data.getReffedURL(url, gb.metrics.refTags.title);
~>
    <a class="a-link-normal" href="{{url}}">
        <span class="a-declarative" data-action="gbdeal-actionrecord" data-gbdeal-actionrecord="{&quot;actionType&quot;:&quot;TITLE&quot;,&quot;position&quot;:&quot;{{data.position}}&quot;,&quot;widgetID&quot;:&quot;{{data.widgetID}}&quot;,&quot;dealID&quot;:&quot;{{data.deal.dealID}}&quot;}">
<~
    }
~>
            <span id="{{data.viewIDs.TITLE}}" class="a-size-base a-color-{{titleColorBase}} {{cssStringBase}}">
                {{title}}
            </span>
            <span id="{{data.viewIDs.TITLE}}" class="a-size-base a-color-{{titleColorLink}} {{cssStringLink}}">
                {{title}}
            </span>
<~
    if(url) {
~>
        </span>
    </a>
<~
    }

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {

        window.gb = window.gb || {};
        window.gb.widgetsToRegister = window.gb.widgetsToRegister || [];

        var preloadDealImages =  function(images) {
            var preloadImages = images.smallSize;
            if (window.devicePixelRatio > 1) {
                preloadImages = images.largeSize;
            }
            for (var i = 0; i < preloadImages.length; i++) {
               (new Image()).src = preloadImages[i];
            }
        }

        preloadDealImages({
   "smallSize" : [
      "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/516fO2ayyoL._AA210_.jpg"
   ],
   "largeSize" : [
      "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/516fO2ayyoL._AA210_.jpg"
   ]
});

                    window.gb.widgetsToRegister.push({
                        widget    : widgetToRegister,
                        resources : window.gb.resourcesToRegister['gb-supple']
                    });

                    P.when('A', 'GoldboxMobile3PAssets', 'GoldboxMobileAssets').execute(function(A) {

                        while(window.gb.widgetsToRegister.length) {
                            var item = window.gb.widgetsToRegister.shift();
                            window.gb.controller = window.gb.controller || new GBController({
                                resources: item.resources,
                                contentMetadata: {
   "originRID" : "1ZVE39SXNYYA4QRS7GWB",
   "browseNode" : null,
   "pageType" : "GoldBox",
   "widgetID" : "2397428202",
   "deviceType" : "pc",
   "reftag" : null,
   "subPageType" : "main",
   "slotName" : "slot-6"
}
                            });
                            window.gb.resources.registerResources(item.resources);
                            window.gb.resources.registerImages();
                            window.gb.controller.registerWidget(item.widget);
                        }
                    });

        }
    })();
</script>

Our other Savings and Sales include hundreds of items throughout Amazon to pique your interest for savings on HDTVs; movies or TV shows; fashion items like clothing, jewelry, and watches; toys; and magazines. <div id="rhf" class="copilot-secure-display" style="clear:both" role="complementary" aria-label="Your Recently Viewed Items and Featured Recommendations">

    <div class="rhf-frame">
        <div id="rhf-container">





<div class='rhf-loading-outer'>
    <table class='rhf-loading-middle'>
    <tr>
        <td class='rhf-loading-inner'>
            <img src="http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/personalization/ybh/loading-4x-gray._CB317976265_.gif" />
        </td>
    </tr>
    </table>
</div>



<script type="text/JavaScript">
(function () {
    "use strict";

    var P = (window.AmazonUIPageJS ? AmazonUIPageJS : window.P);

    var enableYBHLink = function() {
        P.when('p13n-sc-jQuery').execute(function($) {
            $("#ybh-link").click(function() {
                $.ajax({
                      url: '/gp/recent-history-footer/external/ybh-handler.html/187-6023632-6339262',
                      type: "POST",
                      timeout: 2000,
                      data: {
                           parentSession    : '187-6023632-6339262',
                           relatedRequestId : '1ZVE39SXNYYA4QRS7GWB',
                           currentPageType  : 'GoldBox'
                      },
                      dataType: "text",
                      success: function (data, status) {
                           $("#ybh-link").hide();
                           $("#ybh-text-off").hide();
                           $("#ybh-text-on").show();
                      }
                });
            });
        });
    };

    var lazyLoadRHF = function($) {
        var loadCarousel = function(html) {
            P.when('p13n-sc-carousel-init', 'rhf-container')
             .execute(function(carouselInitializer, rhfContainer) {
                rhfContainer.html(html);
                carouselInitializer.init(rhfContainer);
                enableYBHLink();
            });
        };

        var handleSuccess = function(data) {
            if (typeof(data) === 'object' && data.success && data.html) {
                loadCarousel(data.html);
            } else {
                handleError();
            }
        };

        var handleError = function() {
            P.when('rhf-container', 'rhf-error')
             .execute(function(rhfContainer, rhfError) {
                rhfContainer.hide();
                rhfError.show();
            });
        };

        $.ajax({
            url: '/gp/recent-history-footer/external/rhf-handler.html/187-6023632-6339262',
            type: "POST",
            timeout: 5000,
            data: {
                             isAUI : (typeof window.P === 'object' && window.P.AUI_BUILD_DATE) ? 1 : 0,
                     parentSession : '187-6023632-6339262',
                  relatedRequestId : '1ZVE39SXNYYA4QRS7GWB',
                   currentPageType : 'GoldBox',
                currentSubPageType : 'main',
                       excludeASIN : '',
                          auiDebug : '',
                          rviAsins : '',
                          rhfState : '',
                          rhfAsins : '',
                       noP13NCache : '',
                         recsAsins : '',
                        customerID : '',
                   testRecsFailure : '',
                    weblabTriggers : '',
           contextMetadataOverride : ''
            },
            dataType: "json",
            success: function (data, status) {
                handleSuccess(data);
            },
            error: function (xhr, status) {
                handleError();
            }
        });
    };

    P.when('p13n-sc-jQuery').execute(function($) {
        P.declare('rhf-container', $("#rhf-container"));
        P.declare('rhf-error', $("#rhf-error"));
        P.declare('rhf-frame', $(".rhf-frame"));
    });

    P.when('p13n-sc-jQuery', 'rhf-container', 'rhf-frame',
            'p13n-sc-call-on-visible', 'p13n-sc-carousel-init')
     .execute(function($, rhfContainer, rhfFrame, callOnVisible, carouselInitializer) {
        rhfFrame.show();
        callOnVisible.register(rhfContainer, function () { lazyLoadRHF($); }, { distance: '-400' })
    });

})();
</script>
